ModMetaData.name: Gendered Genes
ModMetaData.author: Garry Flowers
ModMetaData.description:
Makes it possible to assign each gene/genepack a gender in the custom Xenotype/Xenogerm creation screens or leave it at the default vanilla way of giving the genes to everyone. If a gene (or another gene that has it as a prerequisite) is not applicable to a pawn due to this it is merely overridden, meaning that these genes are still inheritable as normal, keeping their gender information.
Gender information is passed on via: - Xenogerms - Pregnancy/Birth (including artificial) - Xenoimplanter gene
Due to technical limitations, modded ways of shuffling genes around or reproduction will likely not retain gender information.
Also, the overriding of genes by this mod is done after the vanilla overrides, meaning that gendered genes can still override other genes, even if they shouldn't apply to the pawn in question.
